backend/main.mo: Actor defining access control, user profiles, help requests, lesson categories, and lessons with comparison utilities and initial seeded data.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for version 2 release validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief summaries describing each component or script's purpose.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide documenting versioning, current version 2 features, and release procedures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with root container and main script.
frontend/public/app-version.txt: Static file declaring Version 2, build date, and core application routes.
Node script that checks core app routes over HTTP/HTTPS to validate deployment health.
Runbook describing how to execute and interpret the production smoke check.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining root layout and all routes including learn, guided forms, contact, and lesson detail.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header navigation, main content wrapper, and footer with links and branding.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component rendering the app’s logo image.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/form: Defines predefined form templates with fields, metadata, and examples for guided form creation.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/Guid: Implements a multi‑step guided form wizard with field navigation, validation, and review flow.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/type: Provides TypeScript types for form templates, fields, form data, and validation results.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/vali: Contains validation logic for individual fields and entire forms including email and phone checks.
Displays a hero section for the Learn page with a heading, description, and image.
frontend/src/components/learn/LessonList: Renders lessons filtered by category with loading states, category tabs, and lesson previews.
frontend/src/components/learn/ScamAwaren: Shows a checklist highlighting scam red flags and trustworthy green flags.
frontend/src/components/support/HelpRequ: Provides a help request form with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposes login, logout, identity state, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching lesson data, disclaimer text, support info, and submitting help requests through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering it inside React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactSupportPage.ts: Displays support contact information, a safety reminder, and a help request form using server‑fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/GuidedFormFillingPage: Shows an introduction to guided form filling and renders the multi‑step form wizard component.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Loads and displays the disclaimer, scam awareness checklist, and lesson categories for browsing learning resources.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays lesson details with reading time, tags, disclaimer, and a checklist, handling loading and missing lessons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, existing features, and pending deployment request for Version 2.
